item.title: 日本日产汽车公司将本财年的零售销量预期从之前的 370 万辆下调至 355 万辆，此前该公司在 12 月季度公布的营业利润增幅为 6.4%，低于预期。
item.description: Japan's Nissan Motor revised its retail sales outlook for the current financial year down to 3.55 million vehicles from 3.7 million it had expected previously, after it posted a lower-than-expected 6.4% rise in operating profit in the December quarter reut.rs/3HTFXi0

item.title: 联合利华在 10 个季度以来首次实现销量增长后，启动了 16 亿美元的股票回购计划，尽管这家消费品巨头的首席执行官表示其业绩仍需改善。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Unilever launched a $1.6 billion share buyback after volumes increased for the first time in 10 quarters, although the consumer goods giant's CEO said its performance needs to improve. More here: reut.rs/48999w7

item.title: 迪士尼回击激进投资者，公布了一系列计划，包括向《堡垒之夜》的制作商 Epic Games 投资 15 亿美元。两家公司将共同打造一个 "迪士尼宇宙"。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Disney hit back at activist investors as it unveiled a slew of plans including a $1.5 billion investment in Epic Games, the maker of ‘Fortnite.’ The two will work together to make a ‘Disney universe.’ More here: reut.rs/3Sv5K51

item.title: 软银在截至 12 月的三个月内实现净利润 66 亿美元，结束了连续四个季度亏损的局面，因为公开上市的投资价值有所上升。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: SoftBank posted a net profit of $6.6 billion in the three months to December, ending a streak of four consecutive quarters in the red, as the value of publicly listed investments gained ground. More here: reut.rs/3wb3lVT

item.description: WATCH: Wall Street's enthusiasm about AI has Nvidia on the verge of becoming more valuable than Amazon for the first time in two decades, and more. Here are the big stories from the AI revolution

item.title: 日本投资巨头软银（SoftBank）宣布，在截至 12 月的三个月内，该公司净利润达到 66 亿美元，从而结束了连败的颓势。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: SoftBank snapped its losing streak as the Japanese investment giant said that net profit hit $6.6 billion in the three months to December. More here: reut.rs/3wb3lVT

item.title: 迪斯尼宣布了一系列消息，包括投资《堡垒之夜》制作商 Epic Games，以及计划在 2025 年推出 ESPN 流媒体服务。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description: Disney made a slew of announcements including an investment in ‘Fortnite’ maker Epic Games and plans to launch an ESPN streaming service in 2025. More here: reut.rs/3Sv5K51
